summary: This document contains an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing a vacation and a potential visit. The communication is marked as confidential and may contain privileged information.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is communicating with Jeffrey Epstein about enjoying a vacation and expressing a desire to meet.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is reaching out to Jes Staley to inquire about his vacation and to invite him for a visit.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are friends, as indicated by their casual communication about personal matters.

keyFacts: The email exchange took place on August 14 and 15, 2009.
Jes Staley mentions he is having a great time on a boat during his vacation.
Jeffrey Epstein expresses a desire for Jes Staley to visit him.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
There are indications of a personal relationship between Staley and Epstein.
